00071     public static function loadScripts( $oWidget = null, $sTheme = null )
00072     {
00073         static $_bLoaded = false;
00074 
00075         if ( ! $_bLoaded )
00076         {
00077             //  Instantiate if needed...
00078             $_oWidget = ( null == $oWidget ) ? new CPSEnhanceJS() : $oWidget;

00081             $_sOldPath = $_oWidget->baseUrl;
00082             $_oWidget->baseUrl = $_oWidget->extLibUrl . self::PS_EXTERNAL_PATH;

00085             if ( false !== ( PS::o( PS::_cs()->scriptMap, 'jquery.js' ) ) )
00086                 PS::_cs()->registerCoreScript( 'jquery' );
00087 
00088             //  Register scripts necessary
00089             $_oWidget->pushScriptFile( $_oWidget->baseUrl . '/enhance.js' );
00090             PS::_rs( 'ps.enhancejs.init', 'enhance({loadScripts:"tree/js/jQuery.tree.js"});', CClientScript::POS_HEAD );
00091 
00092             //  Restore path
00093             $_oWidget->baseUrl = $_sOldPath;
00094
